results.definition: characterized by directness in manner or speech; without subtlety or evasion
examples: I gave them my candid opinion
a forthright approach to the problem
tell me what you think--and you may just as well be frank
it is possible to be outspoken without being rude

results.definition: close enough to go straight to the target
in a direct and unequivocal manner
examples: I asked him point-blank whether he wanted the job
